name: Plandzz 2
description: Plandzz 2 is a continuation of part one. You need to solve both simple and challenging puzzles. Gather all the parts to make a whole block.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 CPU Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT/s 4xx or Equivalent Storage: 200 MB available space
